instructions: Tap a location on a map or an item in a list of search results. Tap Add to, then choose a collection.

Swipe up from the top of the search card to show Collections, then choose a collection. If you don t see Collections, continue swiping up. Swipe up on the collection card, tap the Share button , then choose an option.

Swipe up from the top of the search card to show Collections, then choose a collection. If you don t see Collections, continue swiping up. Swipe up on the collection card, then tap Edit at the bottom of the screen. Do any of the following: Rename the collection: Tap the title. Delete a place from the collection: Tap the place, then tap Delete at the bottom of the screen. Change the sort order: Tap Date Added, Name, or Distance, then choose an option. Tap the Close button .
